name: get_2_stockdetails
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stockyapiexchange.
Tool description: Based on the request parameters, StockyAPIExchange can provide relevant information to the user, such as stock details, summary, charts, history, daily, or latest data. The API can also use autocomplete to suggest stock names or ticker symbols as the user types the keyword, making it easier for the front end develepor to create the perfect Tool
API description: Stockdetails: This feature provides detailed information about a specific stock, including its name, ticker symbol, market capitalization, sector, industry, and other key financial metrics such as price-to-earnings ratio (P/E ratio), dividend yield, and earnings per share (EPS)

keyword.description: The stock ticker or keyword to search for. Default is 'GOOG'.
